text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
The solo…? That's the climax of the Votive Dance 
where you dance in the center, right, Yukino?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Are you asking me to take on that part for you?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Y… Yes. I've felt from the beginning that I'm just not up to it…!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I don't think I can handle it ——

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Why don't you try yours on and we can 
see how we look together?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: —— I just don't think I belong in that spotlight.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
But I don't wan' cause trouble by backing out now, so… 
I'll try to stay under the radar and not get in your way…!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ……… That so? Yeah, sure, I can do the solo.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: If that's really what you want then I'll do it.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: … Ms. Curren ——

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
There you are…! What's up, Yukino? 
You looked pretty troubled.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Ah, no, it's nothing! I was just overwhelmed 
by how gorgeous the costumes were!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: But I'm…… fine now!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(I done avoided the topic… but I really need to discuss this 
with Ms. City as well since it's about the dance.)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (This is… fine… right? I'm sure this is the ri——)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… You there. You look free. 
Come with me.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Huh? ……Whaa!? A-Aaare you talking about me!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…… Don't be so jittery. I'm not gonna bite you or anything. 
I just need a partner to run with.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
There's a limit to training alone. 
I crave the sensation of hunting. Come on.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
T-T-That sounds rather chompy to me… 
Ahh, please wait, Ms. Briaaan!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff, huff, haa……!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: —— Raaaaahhh!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Haah… haah… That… That was intense…… 
I'm just… plumb… useless……

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(Ms. Brian is awfully strong, but… it's more than that. 
My legs… They felt different today……)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: —— Your instinct is buried.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Instinct. The thing that remains when everything else is 
stripped away. What you crave from the depths of your soul.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Most competitors bare it on the track. 
…… But tonight, I saw none of that in you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Don't you feel the hunger? In this competitive world?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Um… I……

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …… Never mind. I'll go for another run.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: The night is dark around here. Be careful on your way back.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ah ——

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (Instinct…… My instinct……)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: …… What was it that I desired?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(—— The night sky back home's so much more brilliant, 
like a sea of stars you can dive right into.)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(But the brightest sparkles that always captivated me… 
were the glamorous "city girls" on TV.)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (Standing tall and proud, independent… Just like Ms. City ——)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But I've decided to fully commit to it. 
Please continue to guide me!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
—— Ah, that's it… Ms. City be stunning 'cause 
she goes and makes her own choices.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(I always be thinkin' my sorry ass should be 
blending in, not making waves, but…)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(… If I strip away everything else, like Ms. Brian said… 
what remains in my heart is……!)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: ……… I want to be like that.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I want to be… I want to be a "city girl" too…!!
